title: Final 11th Place, Final Rating 2001: Ooronge-Centered Construction
author: Not specified

pokemon_team.name: Miraidon
pokemon_team.ev_explanation: More durable Miraidon. The EV spread is designed to survive certain attacks and outspeed other Miraidon and Zamazenta. H-B: Survives a Brilliant Diamond from a 220 Attack White Kyurem with a 12.5% chance. = Survives an Ice Fang from a 172 Attack Jolly Chien-Pao with a 12.5% chance. C: 11n. S: Outspeeds base 90 Speed Pokemon by 4.
pokemon_team.role_in_team: Primary special attacker and speed control

pokemon_team.name: Koraidon
pokemon_team.ev_explanation: H: Remaining EVs, good for Flare Blitz recoil, 16n (useful for Grassy Terrain recovery). A: Maximum investment for power. Scale Shot 4 hits guarantees KO on uninvested Chien-Pao. S: Maximum investment, speed ties with Jolly Pao.

pokemon_team.name: Flutter Mane
pokemon_team.ev_explanation: H: Remaining EVs, hoping for more Flare Blitz recoil damage. C: Maximum investment for power. S: Maximum investment for speed.
pokemon_team.role_in_team: Speed control, anti-Trick Room, special attacker

pokemon_team.name: Volcarona
pokemon_team.ev_explanation: H: Maximum investment for bulk. B: 16n+1, even number for Electric Seed efficiency. After Electric Seed, survives two Crunch from a 189 Attack Adamant Chien-Pao (3.5% chance). D: Survives two Astral Barrage from a 217 Special Attack Timid Black Kyurem (8.5% chance).

pokemon_team.name: Grimmsnarl
pokemon_team.ev_explanation: H: Maximum investment for bulk. B: Survives a Heavy Slam from a 141 Attack (4 EV) Zamazenta. D: Remaining EVs.

pokemon_team.name: Incineroar
pokemon_team.ev_explanation: H: High HP investment. A: 11n. B: Survives a Brilliant Diamond + High Horsepower from a 220 Attack White Kyurem. D: Even number, survives a Thunder Drive from a 205 Special Attack Modest Miraidon with some leeway. S: Slightly faster than other Incineroar, slower than slowest Kyogre (-1), outspeeds base 100 with Tailwind.

overall_strategy: The team aims to gain an advantage through single target high power attacks and secure a numbers advantage. The team uses Miraidon and Incineroar as a core, with Grimmsnarl, Volcarona, Koraidon, and Flutter Mane providing support and coverage.
translation_notes: CTS is likely referring to a specific stat calculation or strategy. Black Kyurem is referred to as 黒馬 (Kuro Uma). White Kyurem is referred to as 白馬 (Shiro Uma).
content_summary: The article details a VGC team built around Grimmsnarl and Miraidon, explaining the team's construction process, individual Pokemon builds, and general strategy. The author achieved a final rating of 2001 and placed 11th. The article also includes a rental code for the team.
